name: Three Nights At Amogus
description:
alright before everyone keeps saying that this game sucks

first of all  ̷̬̽t̴̗͙̏ͅh̴̘̮̫̉ī̸͈͒ś̸̼̖̳̒̔ ̷͔̍͜g̸̡͚̓a̶̟̺͋m̷͎̔ͅẻ̸̥̮ ̷̮̮̂ḭ̷̤́s̸̘̺̊͑ ̴̼̆͆̕a̴͉̖̾̽̕ ̵͇͆̓̓j̴̻̀͛̂o̸̼͒͒ḱ̵̨̥̤͛e̵̦̼͚̐

ok so i

made this

when i was bored lol

and it was fun.

this is also my first game with multiple nights. 

The game does have a quite few bugs right now and only has 2 characters and 3 nights.

so please for the love of god don't get mad at me for my coding skills.

Game created with scratch

Thanks to thewikster on scratch for making a tutorial on how to make a good game

check out his vids:thewiksters channel a.k.a how to scratch

anyways enjoy!
